'''''The Lord Of The Rings (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)''''' is an album comprising the soundtrack from the 1978 film ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|The Lord of the Rings]]''. It was released in [[1978]] as a double LP and in [[2001]] as a CD with more tracks, which is the track listing below
